story.kicker_image_caption: Punjab Police is hiring for 7416 posts, apply before June 21
story.storykicker: The Punjab Police has released an official notification inviting all the interested, eligible candidates to apply for various posts in district police cadre and armed police cadre.
story.storybody:
The Punjab Police has released an official notification inviting all the interested, eligible candidates to apply for various posts in district police cadre and armed police cadre.

All the candidates are requested to apply through a prescribed format latest by June 21, 2016.

Vacancy details:

Total post: 7146

Name of the post:

District Police Cadre: 4915

Armed Police Cadre: 2501

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualification:

All the candidates interested in applying must be Class 12 pass from a recognised board/ institute or equivalent with Punjabi language as a compulsory or elective subject.

For more details on eligibility criteria, all the candidates need to check the notification available on its official website.

Age limit:

All the candidates interested in applying must be in the age group of 18-28 years. However, candidates from the reserved category will get age relaxation as per government norms.

Selection procedure:

The selection of the candidate will be done on the basis of Physical Measurement Test (PMT), Physical Screening Test (PST) followed by an interview round.

Application fee:

All the candidates from the general/OBC category need to pay Rs 400 for each application form while the applicants from the SC/ST and other backward classes need to pay Rs 300.

How to apply:

  • All the candidates need to apply online on the website, www.punjabpolicerecruitment.in
  • Click on relevant link
  • All the candidates need to fill in all the details in the prescribed format only
  • Click on submit
  • The applicants are advised to take a printout of the same for future reference

Important dates:

  • The last date to apply is June 21

 

Read: Want to work for High Court of Madhya Pradesh? Apply now for 08 District Legal Aid Officer post

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
